data.text: 📸: Glenn James & Jeff Haynes via NBAE/Getty

Couple of signature sneaker titans going at it in Dallas tonight.

@luka7doncic x @Giannis_An34 https://t.co/5VeMTmqicd
@yostephrivas 👏👏 : Extra incentive for a win tonight to get this dropped as a wallpaper 🔥
*If you donated today, please send me a DM with donation screenshot, and I will give you your raffle number during tonight’s Mavs game. Thank you!
@redditmavericks 🤜🤛

1 hour left to donate to give you a shot at 5 different prizes. Regardless if you win a raffle prize, you still win as you are helping kids get a pair of Luka 1’s!

Raffle drawing will be LIVE on the page tomorrow morning at 8:30AM. https://t.co/9g7SpvEuNQ
@smoothyreal @dallasmavs @Bucks @BallySportsSW @ESPNNBA 📸:@NickkWhite https://t.co/oLgP6LOBfB
@dallasmavs @Bucks @BallySportsSW @ESPNNBA 🔥
@TravisNFLDraft @1053thefan @JaredSandler @inthemageors @OThankKevin @MikeBacsik @SandlotCharity 🔥👀
@CitationXCA They may already be gone. The last few mornings, they have been popping up for 10 - 20 minutes in one size then they disappear.
@michaelgarsha @joshw85 Absolutely. I can transfer the tickets digitally if you win. If you win the signed photo I would like to hand that off in person if at all possible to avoid risks by shipping.
Nominations are still being accepted for candidates for a free pair of Luka 1’s. Nominate a candidate and tell me why you would like to nominate them in the DM’s. Thank you for the opportunity.

With two more ticket donations rolling in today, one by an anonymous follower and one by @joshw85, you now have 5 chances to win in the Kicks for Kids Raffle! Instructions are in the pinned tweet at the top of the page 👆

Just under 23 hours before the raffle closes! https://t.co/4usRJ56CG0

3 years ago today, a cool moment for the page 🙏

Sound 🆙 

🗣️: @MFollowill, @SkinWade, @D_Harp_12 https://t.co/LI5PXxqI37
@IMT00NICE @LukaUpdates 🔮
@redditmavericks Can’t lose! Thank you for this and Happy Birthday - this year will be your best yet 💪
📸 Garrett Ellwood via NBAE/Getty, Luka Doncic/IG

ICYMI: Fresh off debuting one of the wildest Luka 1 colorways we have seen thus far, LD77 was back in his bag in Denver with yet another 🆕 colorway. The black base color was complemented by shades of metallic purple and green, and was on - foot for an LD triple - double and W 😤 https://t.co/lFDnyOCwlg
@ellchamp01 @BallySportsSW @luka7doncic @Jumpman23 They are coming 🔮
🔥NEW LUKA 1🔥 (16)

Know of an all - star student? A big Luka fan? A kid going through a tough time? A kid who simply could use some “Luka Magic” in their life?

The Kicks for Kids raffle has already raised just under 1K! Let me hear from you in a DM, and let’s get some kids a pair of Luka 1’s. https://t.co/dKAj9AOmpf

RT @BallySportsSW: The coldest in the game... @LukaDonkicks on lock 🔒

@luka7doncic | @Jumpman23 https://t.co/WyaD9kDV1x
@kelshmeamyy Big WOW factor on these… You and the team are killing this release 🔥😤

JUST IN: A NEW prize has been added to the Kicks for Kids raffle. Follower of the page @hernandez201124, with an extremely kind gesture, has donated two lower level tickets to the 12/29 game to the cause, now giving you 3 chances to win while helping a kid score some Luka 1’s! https://t.co/eP9GO57orv

Mark Cuban: A Luka 1 guy. 

📸: @dallasmavs https://t.co/DjaEtwtXH8 https://t.co/vbAmeFio6P
@LukaUpdates 11/10 respectfully.
📸 Glenn James via NBAE/Getty and @NickkWhite with the sneaker shots.

The 15th variation of the Jordan Luka 1 worn by Luka Dončić this season was no doubt the most eye catching. The primary magenta colorway was complemented by black panels, a baby blue heel pull, a gold Luka logo, and a marbled pattern inside the FlightWire. https://t.co/aVPCJitmRK
🔥NEW LUKA 1🔥 (15)
@CallieCaplan I’m here for this line of questioning.

On the scene is @IsaacLHarris, also on the scene is this vibrant, previously unseen Luka 1 ☔️

#PregameKicks https://t.co/0y68cp8gaL
@redditmavericks Thank you for sharing @redditmavericks 🤝

1st Day UPDATE:

$296 Raised in 4 hours

AND

Two possible additional raffle prizes through very generous donations. Thank you everyone for the support! 🙏

Their will be TWO raffle winners. Whoever gets picked first will have their choice of the autographed photo OR the tickets. You do not have to enter the raffle to be eligible to nominate a kid for the shoes.

To submit a deserving kid for a pair of Luka 1’s, please DM the page on Twitter or Instagram and let me know why they deserve a pair. Candidates must live in the DFW area. Number of kids chosen will be correlated to the amount of money raised. Good luck!
To buy raffle tickets, submit payment to the LukaDonkicks Venmo account. Upon payment, DM a screenshot of your payment so I can add you to a spreadsheet for the drawing. https://t.co/NV7ms6KJru

With the holidays approaching, I would like to give back. I am raffling off two prizes: A Luka Dončić signed photo and a pair of premium (5 rows behind the basket) tickets to the 12/27 Mavs game. Money raised will be used to buy deserving kids in DFW a pair of Luka 1’s! https://t.co/Jn5BtPE6Lc
@caseybuschertv @luka7doncic Hopefully 🔜!
@kgb_94 @redditmavericks Obi has been the most frequent. It’s been something fun to keep an eye on 👀 https://t.co/pugBQRVG3X
📈SHOE MODEL APPEARANCES / PPG REPORT📈 - Weekly sneaker report dropping a day early this week as something else will be posted tomorrow morning…something big 🔮 https://t.co/Vvc7fOzwic
@RG3Johnson Obi is part of the @Jumpman23 fam, and has worn them quite frequently this season.

LD was not the only player wearing his shoes in today’s game. Mavs teammate Tim Hardaway Jr. laced up in the “Michigan” PE colorway while the Knicks Obi Toppin wore the “Reverse Orca” colorway.

📸 Nathaniel Butler via NBAE/Getty https://t.co/nnVzaQVZkG

Breds in The Garden, it just makes sense…

And a WIN 😤 https://t.co/MTywtFkBaU
BIG thanks to @brungophoto for capturing and sharing 📸🔥

Hey @satou_sabally, you got next!

Jordan Luka 1 “Ballerina” https://t.co/hERXKbj96O

In tonight’s matchup with the Pistons, Luka Dončić wore his 14th variation of the Jordan Luka 1 this season with the “Reverse Orca” colorway. 

📸 Brian Sevald & Gregory Shamus via NBAE/Getty https://t.co/fApqIcXpcS

🔥NEW LUKA 1🔥 (14)

“Reverse Orca” game debut
@guerabb74 @hibbettsports That pair will be the “For the Love,” they just have not listed it by that name. Hibbett is set to drop the “Imaginarium,” but it’s not listed by that name.
@TommystylesT They dropped in several regions today 👀
@abhinair66 OU exclusive. You may randomly find one on eBay 👀
SIDE 📝: One difference about this PE is the bottom of the shoe. This version features both an enlarged Jumpman logo, as well as the OU logo. https://t.co/VFCObZgRI9

PE Watch 👀 

@OU_MBBall turning up the HEAT 🔥 https://t.co/kVLiuZpKBB
@BRKFSTCLB_ @Giannis_An34 @luka7doncic @NickDePaula ‼️
@SLAMKicks @luka7doncic @Jumpman23 The “Phil Knights” 🤯🔥
@tyler_pfit @kevinjairaj @Jumpman23 The “Imaginarium” are set to be released on 12.12.22.

About last night…

2 new signature shoe variations in a signature performance ⚡️⚡️

📸 @kevinjairaj https://t.co/ax7oAJ4jgV
@getnickwright Fittingly tied Dirk with a 41 point effort tonight ✨
@LeeJ09 Love that energy 😤
@BC_Buckets18 2-2 in the regular season. The other #shoeswap came in the preseason.
@ESPNNBA And fittingly tied him with a 41 point game ✨
With two new pairs added tonight, Luka Dončić has now worn 141 different sneaker variations while wearing a Dallas Mavericks uniform. (Preseason + Regular Season + Playoffs)

In tonight’s victory over the Warriors, two Jordan Luka 1’s made their game debuts. The first half saw the “Phil Knight” PE colorway before a 5th #shoeswap of the season lead to the first look of the “Imaginarium” colorway on - foot. 

📸 Glenn James via NBAE/Getty https://t.co/KB5mCtGtHi
@TomSelleck420 💯

🚨#SHOESWAP🚨 (5)

And…

🔥NEW LUKA 1🔥 (13)

“Imaginarium” game debut

🔥NEW LUKA 1🔥 (12)

“Phil Knight” PE game debut

For the second time in the last three games, Luka Dončić opted for the Jordan Luka 1 “Marquette” PE in the baby blue/yellow colorway. This PE is the second Marquette PE Luka has worn this season, as a variation was worn in the preseason. 

📸 Gary Dineen via NBAE/Getty https://t.co/GWUCEbbTAN

“Imaginarium”

The official name of LD’s next scheduled Luka 1 release has dropped.

In 2021, Luka wore two colorways of the Jordan 35 “Imaginarium” LD7 PE. The colorway was “inspired by Luka's imaginative game and has a multicolor graphic referencing outer space.”

Luka Doncic is 23 years old. 

Dirk Nowitzki played 20 years, all for the Mavs, and is the NBA’s 6th all time leading scorer. 

Luka Doncic and Dirk Nowitzki now have the same number of career 40 point games!!!

Doesn’t seem possible, but it is.
@LukaDonkicks I wore these all day... https://t.co/mZyKk7dM3j
@LukaDonkicks what is the Mavs record when Luka changes shoes during the game?
Luka Doncic is now tied with Dirk Nowitzki for the second most 40-point games in Mavericks history 📈 https://t.co/6dCFtQHtuX
